section-3.name: Section 3
section-3.title: Data & finance
section-3.description: Choose the phrase which best describes your approach to the following topics…

questions.title: Data storage

options.answer: We don’t know if we store and use data appropriately
We hold data in house and are confident that our in-house data storage regime is robust
We hold our data within 3rd party systems and are confident that our 3rd party data supplier’s storage regime is robust
We hold our data within 3rd party systems however, we have not investigated the data storage protocols of our third party suppliers

questions.title: Risk management

options.answer: We do not know if our data collection and management is a risk to our organisation
We understand our data collection and management is a risk, steps need to be taken
We have assessed the risks and are confident of how we collect and manage data

questions.title: GDPR/Data Protection 2018 Regulations

options.answer: We did not achieve compliance with the regulations in 2018 and have made no progress since then
We were in a strong position when the regulations came into force but have not really maintained this
We feel confident that the processes we had in place to ensure a good level of compliance remain active and adhered to throughout the organisation

questions.title: Protecting your finances from scams

options.answer: We have limited understanding of cyber-enabled fraud
We have a good understanding of cyber-enabled fraud and have trained staff on how to spot it taken
We have put in place specific measures to protect against cyber-enabled fraud and are confident in our ability to spot the full range of potential scams

section-4.name: Section 4
section-4.title: Preventing and responding to cyber attacks

questions.title: The National Cyber Security Centre recommend five key areas to focus on to protect against the most common cyber attacks. To what extent have you taken action on each of the following topics…

options.answer: We take regular backups of our important data
We have enabled malware protection on all devices
Our mobile devices can be tracked, locked, and wiped and are regularly updated, including apps
We have effective password protection on all computers and mobile devices
We are familiar with the nature of phishing attacks and have passed this knowledge on to our trustees, staff and volunteers
